HydroEnR 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    getAMAX

    getAMAX.Rd

    Extract annual maximum peak data from various data sources.

    getAMAX(x, ...)

# S3 method for numeric
getAMAX(x = flow, Date = date, ...)

# S3 method for HydroAggsmax
getAMAX(x)

# S3 method for flowLoad
getAMAX(x, ...)

# S3 method for zoo
getAMAX(x, ...)

    Arguments

    x

    A dataset containing flow data, generated from HydroEnR functions

    ...

    Extra parameters if required

    Value

    Examples

    getAMAX(Flows = Buildwas$Value, Date = Buildwas$DateTime)
#> Error in getAMAX(Flows = Buildwas$Value, Date = Buildwas$DateTime): argument "x" is missing, with no default
getAMAX(Buildwas_Analysis)
#> Error in getAMAX(Buildwas_Analysis): object 'Buildwas_Analysis' not found
getAMAX(Buildwas)
#> Error in getAMAX(Buildwas): object 'Buildwas' not found
rnrfa::get_ts(id = 2001, type = 'amax-flow') %>% getAMAX()
#>      Year      V1
#>     <num>   <num>
#>  1:  1975 120.209
#>  2:  1976 158.699
#>  3:  1977 128.289
#>  4:  1978 198.254
